TLDR;

I'm a passion & creative driven developer who has ton of others passion: basketball, cycling, photography are few of them.

Since 2014 I have lent my expertise in the software develpoment and solution architect fields in Europe.
I've been working as a software engineer & solution architect for 8+ years in both product and consultancy companies, taking the best from both worlds.
I'm currently working as a Software Development Engineer at Adobe, in Paris, where I'm developing and optimizing the Adobe Stock project in an Agile team (SCRUM).
